page.title: 15Police and Crime
page.content: A policeman today has to be 5 feet 9 inches tall,he must have at least 4 "o"levels including maths and English. He needs perfect eyesight.He wears a black suit when on duty,with his private number on his shoulders.He always carries a black notebook, a radio called a two-in-one which allows him to transmit and receive messages- this is his most important piece of {Technical Equipment.}He also carries a truncheon for controlling violence, a warrant card and hand-cuffs. He wears a traditional helmet for warmth but a much stronger one for riots. Tidbury Green is surved by W.Midlands police and Earlswood by Warwickshire police.There are 230 000 crimes committed every month in the W.Midlands.The most prevalent crimes in the area are vandalism,burglary, bicycle and car thefts.
